original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 839: I Want to Get Paid Twice
original_content:
This week Jonathan chats with benny Vasquez about AlmaLinux! Why is AlmaLinux the choice for slightly older hardware? What is the deal with RISC-V? And how does EPEL fit in? Tune in to find out!


https://www.linkedin.com/in/bennyvasquez/
almalinux.org
https://almalinux.org/blog/2025-04-24-election-announcement/
https://almalinux.org/blog/2025-06-26-epel-v2-now-covers-almalinux-10-stable/


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.

title: アルマLinux：古いハードウェアに最適な理由
body: 今週のポッドキャストはAlmaLinuxについて、古いハードウェアへの適合やEPELについて語る。
titles: アルマLinux：古いハードウェアに最適な理由
RISC-Vとは？新たな技術トレンドを探る
EPELの役割とアルマLinux 10の関係
FLOSS Weeklyポッドキャスト：最新エピソードのハイライト
バニー・バスケスとの対談：オープンソースの未来を語る
